nodes.text: Hirael Chindiaye was a Human male who was present in the Adventure's Guild Hall in Aurilia on Dathomir in 1 ABY. After the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Blackguard defected to the Black Sun in the Bright Jewel system, he hired a team of spacers to capture it, so he could sell it for salvage.

Hirael Chindiaye was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
